definition: at the same time/simultaneously/(when stating a quantity that is a round number) exactly
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
suffix for nouns
to go forward together (idiom); to undertake simultaneous tasks/going hand in hand
treating everyone the same, regardless of individual differences/one-size-fits-all approach/(typesetting) block paragraphs (no indenting, and blank space between each paragraph)

sentences.english: Horse Racing and Thoroughbred Sales go hand in hand at Magic Millions.
sentences.chinese: 賽馬及良種銷售齊頭並進，在魔術數百萬人。

sentences.english: The right way to reduce our excess nuclear forces is in parallel with Russia.
sentences.chinese: 減少我們過剩核力量的正確途徑是與俄羅斯齊頭並進。

sentences.english: Work and rest go together, hand in hand.
sentences.chinese: 工作和休息齊頭並進，相得益彰。

sentences.english: And it does not align IT and the business.
sentences.chinese: 而且它不能讓IT與業務保持齊頭並進。

sentences.english: At the end of the fourth lap, Sun Mei and I were neck and neck.
sentences.chinese: 在第四圈的最後一段，孫梅和我齊頭並進。

sentences.english: They travel in tight packs, sometimes as many as 20 abreast.
sentences.chinese: 他們密集穿行，有時候多達20輛車齊頭並進。

sentences.english: The block form refers that the first word of each line should juxtapose with each other.
sentences.chinese: 行首齊頭式指信頭數行的每行第一個字母上下對齊。

sentences.english: In terms of improving access to medicines, price and quality go hand in hand.
sentences.chinese: 在改進藥品的獲得性方面，價格和質量齊頭並進。

sentences.english: Education and health go hand in hand.
As the horses raced towards the finishing post, there was nothing in it.
sentences.chinese: 臨近終點時，那幾匹馬齊頭並進，簡直分不出先後。

definition: sunrise industry
requirement/necessary condition (math)
It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom)/fig. a good education program takes a long time to develop/cf. 十年樹木，百年樹人|十年树木，百年树人
to fight alone (idiom)
civil society
to receive worldwide attention
to love Hong Kong (usually implying that one also supports the PRC government)
to do with the masses/mass (meeting, movement etc)
mainstay industry
extremely rare (idiom)/once in a blue moon
general trend/irresistible trend
to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
interregional/spanning two or more PRC provinces
to charge and break through enemy lines
to do things each in one's own way
self-employed/a private firm (PRC usage)
